name: Exist is True
description:
Robert the ghost has gotten himself lost in the void. The void is a strange place where things are constantly shifting, both in ways that help and hinder Robert the ghost. Help Robert escape by taking control of him and navigating the void.

For an extra challenge, try collecting all 14 of the essences throughout the game!

The game contains five levels that I designed. I also designed the art assets and background music. Sound effects are thanks to JSFX (an online sound generator).
